title: Photon properties - speeds of photon and electron

content.prompt: A photon is moving toward the right with an initial frequency fi. The photon then interacts with an electron that is initially moving to the left, toward the photon. After the interaction, the photon has a new frequency ff that is greater than fi. Which of the following correctly describes the change, if any, in the speeds of the photon and the electron as a result of the interaction?

choices.label: The photon’s speed stays the same and the electron’s speed decreases.
The photon’s speed stays the same and the electron’s speed increases.
The photon’s speed increases and the electron’s speed decreases.
The photon’s speed and the electron’s speed both increase.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
